page.title: 06Life on the West Road.
page.content: On West Road there are a few swings.Beside the swings is a demolished area which used to be the Pickford and Holland factory. My street is called Lax Terrace,if you go further up you come to Hartside school where I sometimes go to attend the disco. At the bottom of my street there are some agricultural merchants who sell wheat and pet food. Across the road there is a garage and Norvite Kitchens which appears to be closed most of the time. Next to my house is a field where we all play games. In my house there are three downstairs rooms and four upstairs rooms,so we have a bedroom each.
